ViewObject.Name: XxcsoRscRtnRsrcLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT xrv2.employee_number, xrv2.full_name FROM XXCSO_RESOURCES_V2 xrv2, (SELECT CASE WHEN TO_DATE(xrv2.issue_date, 'YYYYMMDD') > TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) THEN xrv2.work_base_code_old ELSE xrv2.work_base_code_new END bs_code FROM XXCSO_RESOURCES_V2 xrv2 WHERE xrv2.user_id = fnd_global.user_id) WHERE ( (TO_DATE(xrv2.issue_date, 'YYYYMMDD') > TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xrv2.work_base_code_old=bs_code) OR (TO_DATE(xrv2.issue_date, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xrv2.work_base_code_new=bs_code) )
